bug.short_desc: gradients not rendered in textfields in modern theme on IE10 and IE9

long_desc.thetext:
While porting my theme to diet I've observed that gradients defined in decorators and used in textfields (input) are not rendered in IE10 and IE9.
To reproduce open the form demo of demo browser with modern theme
http://demo.qooxdoo.org/devel/demobrowser/demo/ui/FormInvalids.html?qxenv:qx.theme:qx.theme.Modern
in IE10 or IE9 and for comparison in Chrome, Firefox and IE8.
While Chrome and Firefox show a (slight) gradient IE9 and IE10 show a simple white background.
Interrestingly in IE8 the gradient IS rendered whereby the focused decorator shows up very intense compared to chrome and firefox.

This may be of valuable help:
http://ie.microsoft.com/testdrive/Graphics/CSSGradientBackgroundMaker/Default.html
In this demo my IE10 10.0.9200.16635 on Windows 7 x64 shows gradients while IE9 9.0.8112.16421 on Windows Vista x64 does not.

I've observed you're currently working on changes regarding decorators for IE8 and wanted to ask if it would be possible to have a fix for this in version 3.
Regards Dietrich

Thanks for the report. Fixed it immediately and this will be included in the 3.0 ;)
